metadata.Title: CVE-2023-26037 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: ZoneMinder is a free, open source Closed-circuit television softwareapplication for Linux which supports IP, USB and Analog cameras. Versionsprior to 1.36.33 and 1.37.33 contain an SQL Injection. The minTime andmaxTime request parameters are not properly validated and could be usedexecute arbitrary SQL. This issue is fixed in versions 1.36.33 and 1.37.33.

criterions.comment: zoneminder: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
